languages.text: "Твоя душа уже сияет, Амик'Арджента. Но если Смерть призовет тебя раньше меня, я сохраню твой прах для самого снежного мира".

traits.locale_text: "Твоя душа уже сияет, Амик'Арджента. Но если Смерть призовет тебя раньше меня, я сохраню твой прах для самого снежного мира".

languages.text: "Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."
languages.original_text: "Твоя душа уже сияет, Амик'Арджента. Но если Смерть призовет тебя раньше меня, я сохраню твой прах для самого снежного мира".

traits.locale_text: "Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if Death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the snowy world."
"Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if Death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the snowy world."
"Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if Death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the snowy world."
"Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."
"Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."
"Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."

languages.text: «Su alma brilla por sí misma, Amic'Argenta. Pero si la muerte la convoca antes que a mí, llevaré sus cenizas hasta el mundo más nevado que exista».
languages.original_text: "Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."

languages.text: 「アルジェンタ、あなたの魂はすでに輝いている。けれどもし死が我より先に呼ぶのなら、あなたの灰を、この世で最も雪深い惑星に納めましょう」
languages.original_text: "Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."

languages.text: “你的灵魂已经熠熠生辉了，信者阿洁塔。不过，如果死亡先带走了你，我会把你的骨灰葬在白雪皑皑的世界。”
languages.original_text: "Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."

languages.text: "Eure Seele strahlt bereits, Amic'Argenta. Aber falls Euch der Tod vor mir ruft, verstreue ich Eure Asche auf der schneereichsten Welt, die es gibt."
languages.original_text: "Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."

languages.text: « Votre âme étincelle déjà, Amic'Argenta. Mais si la mort venait à vous appeler avant moi, je conserverai vos cendres pour les répandre sur un monde recouvert de neige. »
languages.original_text: "Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."
"Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."

languages.text: "Ruhun hâlihazırda ışıldıyor Amic'Argenta. Lakin ölüm seni benden önce çağırırsa küllerini olabilecek en karlı dünyaya ayıracağım."
languages.original_text: "Your soul already shines, Amic'Argenta. But if death calls you before me, I will keep your ashes for the richest world of snow there is."
